job_title: CPU Tools and Diagnostics Development Engineer
job_description:
• Experience with x86 CPU's and Instruction Set Architecture.
• Experience with power management, power-up sequences, clocking, and reset sequences.
• Experience with silicon bring-up, validation, and debugging.
• Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
• Familiarity with CPU product characteristics such as frequency, voltage, thermal design power, and performance.
• Knowledge of Design-for-Test (DFT) and Design-for-Debug (DFD) methodologies.
• Understanding of system-level architecture including SoC, DRAM/memory, PCIe, and board-level interactions.
• Exposure to silicon debug tools and infrastructure.
